posts.title: Hello World -- 部落格建置中
posts.text: 2024/06/08 部落格建立，初步調整2024/06/10 新增留言區功能2024/06/12 加入 Google Analytics2024/06/13 開啟 busuanzi 全站瀏覽數統計及章閱讀數統計功能2024/06/16 樣式調整1：網站背景、navbar

pages.text: body { background-image: url("/img/background.png"); background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; } .navbar-main { background-color: rgba(56,118,29,0.3); } .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:focus, .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:focus-within, .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:hover { color: #f7f7f7; } .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:focus, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:focus-within, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:hover, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item.is-active { background-color: rgba(250,250,250,0.2); color: #f7f7f7; border-radius: 16px; font-size: larger; } .footer { background-color: rgba(56,118,29,0.2); }

body { background-image: url("/img/background.png"); background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-attachment: fixed; } .navbar-main { background-color: rgba(56,118,29,0.3); } .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:focus, .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:focus-within, .navbar-brand a.navbar-item:hover { color: #f7f7f7; } .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:focus, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:focus-within, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item:hover, .navbar-menu a.navbar-item.is-active { background-color: rgba(250,250,250,0.2); color: #f7f7f7; border-radius: 16px; } .footer { background-color: rgba(56,118,29,0.2); }
